markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs=""
>
[Primal Rampage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2846) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin. You gain [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) and [_stoneskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=312) as 4th-level primal innate spells that you can cast once per day. As a 3-action activity, you can Cast a Spell twice to cast both of these innate spells, as long as they are both still available for the day.
name: Primal Rampage

As a 3-action activity, you can Cast a Spell twice to cast both of these innate spells, as long as they are both still available for the day.
